configurazione.query_config: UPDATE NODO4_CFG.CONFIGURATION_KEYS s SET s.CONFIG_VALUE = '?1' WHERE s.CONFIG_KEY = '?2'

NewMod3.payment_status: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.position_payment: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE PAYMENT_TOKEN ='$activatePaymentNoticeResponse.paymentToken'
NewMod3.payment_status_retry_05_token1: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activatePaymentNotice1Request.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.position_payment_retry_05_token1: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE PAYMENT_TOKEN ='$activatePaymentNotice1Response.paymentToken'
NewMod3.position_payment_retry_05_token2: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE PAYMENT_TOKEN ='$activatePaymentNotice2Response.paymentToken'
NewMod3.position_subject: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN POSITION_PAYMENT p ON s.ID = p.PAYER_ID WHERE p.PAYMENT_TOKEN ='$activatePaymentNoticeResponse.paymentToken'
NewMod3.position_receipt: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' and s.PA_FISCAL_CODE= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.position_receipt_retry_rev_db_gr_02_1: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' and s.PA_FISCAL_CODE= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode' and s.PAYMENT_TOKEN='$activatePaymentNotice.paymentToken'
NewMod3.position_receipt_recipient: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' and s.PAYMENT_TOKEN= '$activatePaymentNoticeResponse.paymentToken'
NewMod3.position_receipt_xml: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.position_receipt_recipient_status: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' and s.PAYMENT_TOKEN= '$activatePaymentNotice.paymentToken'

AppIO.DB_AIPR_01_AppIO: SELECT * from POSITION_ACTIVATE WHERE CREDITOR_REFERENCE_ID  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.creditorReferenceId' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.DB_AIPR_02_AppIO: SELECT * from POSITION_SERVICE WHERE COMPANY_NAME  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.companyName' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND NOTICE_ID = '$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber'
AppIO.DB_AIPR_04_AppIO: SELECT * from POSITION_PAYMENT_PLAN WHERE PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND NOTICE_ID = '$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber' AND CREDITOR_REFERENCE_ID  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.creditorReferenceId' AND AMOUNT = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.totalAmount'
AppIO.DB_AIPR_05_AppIO: SELECT * from POSITION_TRANSFER WHERE PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND NOTICE_ID = '$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber' AND CREDITOR_REFERENCE_ID  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.creditorReferenceId' AND AMOUNT = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.totalAmount'
AppIO.DB_AIPR_06_AppIO: SELECT x.* FROM  POSITION_SERVICE y LEFT JOIN POSITION_SUBJECT x ON y.DEBTOR_ID = x.ID WHERE y.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND y.NOTICE_ID = '$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber'
AppIO.payment_status: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode'

Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_carrello_napshot: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_rpt: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_carrello: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_rpt_snapshot: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
